SELECT SUM([TopupNum]) as TopupNum ,SUM([TopupAmount]) as TopupAmount ,SUM([DebitNum] + [DelayPaidNum] + [UnPaidNum]) as DebitNum ,SUM([DebitAmount] + [DelayPaidAmount] + [UnPaidAmount]) as DebitAmount ,COALESCE(SUM([RefundNum]),0)+COALESCE(SUM([QRRefundNum]),0)+COALESCE(SUM([ICRefundNum]),0) as RefundNum ,COALESCE(SUM([RefundAmount]),0)+COALESCE(SUM([QRRefundAmount]),0)+COALESCE(SUM([ICRefundAmount]),0) as RefundAmount FROM [dbo].[BAR_DailySummary_Base]
and MerchantCode=#{code}

SELECT Convert(varchar(10),createddate,121) as date,count(*) as DayRegister FROM [dbo].[BAR_Account] where createddate > DATEADD(day,-7,getdate()) and MerchantCode=#{code} group by Convert(varchar(10),createddate,121)

SELECT CONVERT(varchar(10), [TxnDate], 121) as date ,SUM([TopupNum]) as DayTopupNum ,SUM([TopupAmount]) as DayTopupAmount ,SUM([DebitNum] + [DelayPaidNum] + [UnPaidNum]) as DayDebitNum ,SUM([DebitAmount] + [DelayPaidAmount] + [UnPaidAmount]) as DayDebitAmount ,SUM([RefundNum]) as DayRefundNum ,SUM([RefundAmount]) as DayRefundAmount FROM [dbo].[BAR_DailySummary_Base] where DATEDIFF(d, [TxnDate], GETDATE()) < 7 and MerchantCode=#{code} GROUP BY CONVERT(varchar(10), [TxnDate], 121)
